mapper.sql: user_id as leafId, username as leafName, password as password, birth_date as birthDate, sex as sex, age as age
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO user_info ( user_id , username , password , birth_date , sex , age ) VALUES ( #{userId,jdbcType=BIGINT} , #{username,jdbcType=VARCHAR} , #{password,jdbcType=VARCHAR} , #{birthDate,jdbcType=DATE} , #{sex,jdbcType=TINYINT} , #{age,jdbcType=INTEGER} )
mapper.update: UPDATE user_info SET username = #{username,jdbcType=VARCHAR} , password = #{password,jdbcType=VARCHAR} , birth_date = #{birthDate,jdbcType=DATE} , sex = #{sex,jdbcType=TINYINT} , age = #{age,jdbcType=INTEGER} WHERE user_id = #{userId}
mapper.sql: select o.org_no as leafId, o.org_name as leafName, 'ORG' as leafType from o_org o where o.p_org_no = #{parentId} and 'ORG' = #{parentType} union select to_char(l.line_id) as leafId,l.line_name as leafName,'LINE' as leafType from g_line l, g_line_tg_rela r, g_tg t where t.org_no = #{parentId} and r.tg_id = t.tg_id and r.line_id = l.line_id and 'ORG' = #{parentType} union select to_char(t.tg_id) as leafId, t.tg_name as leafName, 'TG' as leafType from g_tg t where t.org_no = #{parentId} and ('ORG' = #{parentType} or 'LINE' = #{parentType})
